profile_positions.description:
Working for our client FedEx as a technical project manager leading transformation projects:

1. Optimus 004 (5.5M GBP): Successfully led this massive program where TNT/FedEx’s old storage and compute infrastructure was transformed into 48 node Dell hyperconverged infrastructure with successful enablement of the DR position of newly deployed “Tapeless” backup solution. This project had 766 hosts migrated with virtualizing 96 servers. This modernization has yield at least 40% performance increase for TNT/FedEx’s key business applications.

2. SCC Decommissioning (2M GBP): Led and drove digital transformation strategy rolled out by FedEx express; from the business case preparation, assessment, discovery, analysis, design and deployment, treatment plan, test plan and migration execution. All the migrations are successfully completed, and the decommissioning work is ongoing which is ahead of schedule by 1 month.

3. Teradata re-platforming (5M GBP): This extremely complex project is currently led by me where I am transforming the UK based BI infrastructure for FedEx Express. I’m leading this project to migrate the existing Teradata data warehousing infrastructure into Azure based Teradata Intellicloud platform along with disaster recovery solution enabled.

4. Liege transformation (4M GBP): I led this transformation project for FedEx express where Liege being their crucial hub operations DC required to be modernized. This project was to deliver the Dell VxRail500 E560 hyperconverged compute capacity, tapeless backup solution (Data Domain 6800) with the DR implemented. As a technical PM on this project I’ve led successful migrations of 79 servers with 27 TB of data onto this new hyperconverged platform.

5. FedEx POD modernization: Saved client’s 800K GBP where I conducted capacity re-evaluation and landing zone was finalized with optimised storage solution. This approach saved the cost of buying additional VxRail Hyperconverged infrastructure.

profile_positions.description:
▪ Migration factory: I developed this service offering where I designed unit-based delivery model for any modernization projects for our clients which included end to end modernization cycle commencing discovery, assessment, treatment plan, P2V feasibility report, move group planning and migration execution with very specialised approach. This included skills and toolsets usage such as Carbonite, MPX router, OVM, Vcenter Converter etc.
▪ Disaster recovery service: Have designed this service offering was specifically to provide clients with Storage centric DR service which provided assessment, design, build, deploy and testing services across multiple technologies. This service offering usage of various tools and technologies like EMC SRDF, EMC Clone, Multi- concurrent copies, Snap mirror, IBM Flash copy etc.
▪ Backup migration service: I developed this key modernization service to offer our clients with the migration services from traditional tape-based backup into either on-prem modern backup solutions or cloud-based backup solutions. This offering been offered for range of backup products such as Netbackup appliances, EMC Data domain, HP Data protector etc. where it had typical 3 staged approach of discovery & assessment, build and migrations.
profile_positions.title: Storage Capability Leader

profile_positions.description:
▪ Storage transformation project: I successfully completed this transformation project for BP where the client was going thru the transformation journey where there were old EOL storage technologies contributing into high severity incidents and availability of the crucial systems. I picked up right from the capacity evaluation, identified hotspots, provided right sizing recommendations while modernizing the infrastructure. I led this project to seamlessly deliver migrations of 1200 hosts from 10 x EMC Clariions, 2 x Hitachi & 1 x DMX3000 arrays into new EMC VNX arrays. With given modernization in place client have had seen massive 43% decline into the high severity incidents related to infrastructure.
▪ Enablement of Capacity management: With the transformation journey, the crucial element was to implement effective capacity management function for BP. I ran capacity evaluations, identified the hot spots, projected the organic growth for next quarter and suggested to have ongoing capacity management service with our client which was gracefully accepted. Due to this service offered to the client, there was at least 23% of Opex savings yielded by the customer where right sizing options were suggested and optimization project was put in place.
▪ Disaster recovery planning and execution: As an appointed DR champion for this client where I led this very crucial activity of updating Disaster recovery plan, defining the RTO and RPO for each application set, updating the scripts and planning and execution of annual DR exercises. The magnitude of this activity can be imagined when there is a potential to impact 28000 users with one error in the DR plan.
